definition: to withdraw/to pull back/to contract/to shrink/to reduce/abbreviation/also pr. [su4]

sentences.english: YOLO is an acronym for "you only live once".
sentences.chinese: YOLO是“你只活一次”的英文首字母縮寫。

sentences.english: Avoid abbreviations, because people tend to spell out words in searches.
sentences.chinese: 避免使用縮寫，人們在搜索時，一般會拼寫出單詞。

sentences.english: But Lista always thought that abbreviated for "Love".
sentences.chinese: 但她認爲那是“愛”的縮寫。

sentences.english: Fixed Lightning Fury to do initial weapon damage.
sentences.chinese: 確實用縮寫名籤武器損壞固定的閃電暴怒。

sentences.english: Fixed Plague Javelin to do initial weapon damage.
sentences.chinese: 確實用縮寫名籤武器損壞固定的災害標槍。

sentences.english: Her initials were enchased on the monument.
sentences.chinese: 她的名字縮寫字母刻在紀念碑上。

sentences.english: NATO is how you abbreviate the North Atlantic Treaty Organization.
sentences.chinese: 北大西洋公約組織常被縮寫成NATO。

sentences.english: A long story can sometimes be condensed into a few sentences.
sentences.chinese: 一個長篇故事常常可以縮寫成幾個句子。

sentences.english: He abbreviated so much that it was hard to understand his article.
sentences.chinese: 他的文章縮寫詞使用太多，令人費解。

sentences.english: English abbreviations HEAO , namely, high-energy observatory.
sentences.chinese: 英文縮寫HEAO，即“高能天文臺”。

sentences.english: This is a condensed version of the Book; it's only half as long as the original Book.
sentences.chinese: 這是該書的縮寫本，只有原著篇幅的一半。

sentences.english: God forbid I assume LOL means “lots of love”.
sentences.chinese: 上帝不准我把LOL設想爲“許多愛”的英文縮寫。

sentences.english: ASDIC is an acronym for antisubmarine detection investigation committee.
sentences.chinese: 是“反潛艇偵查調查委員會”的縮寫形式。

sentences.english: The standard 3-letter abbreviation for the constellation.
sentences.chinese: 每個星座三個字母的標準縮寫。

sentences.english: RRD is the acronym for Round Robin Database.
BFF is not my friend's name. BFF is an acronym.
sentences.chinese: BFF一定是你朋友名字的縮寫吧。

definition: to write characters in simplified form/the simplified form of a character/to abbreviate (a word or expression)/to write in simple language
to err/to dial a wrong number/to make a typo
meaning (implicit in a phrase)/implied meaning/hidden meaning/hint/connotation
Hanyu Pinyin, the romanization system used in the PRC since the 1960s
hangul, Korean phonetic alphabet/Korean written language
to err/to get sth wrong/to miscalculate/to misunderstand
